lines.text: I've had it... can't take anymore... you made me feel asahmed today... I'm not going to school anymore!
Whaaat? Now I see you're my little daughter! Y'know, I was just like ya! I hated school too.
BUT I LOVE SCHOOL ! CAN'T YA SEE IT ?
Hi there! Thanks again, too.
Say, that's unbelievable! Yore workin' too?
Huh... we're actually workin' on holidays and for parties.D'ya want a caramel dumplin'...? WHAT THE...! YOU DOPE! HOW MANY FUCKIN'TIMES DO I HAVE TO SHOW YOU ?
Chie... you know those guys ?
Yup! I protected 'em from ol'Tetsu. Take your time now.I'll be back in a minute.
OK.But don't forget to come back, 'cos I'm owin' ya somethin'.Right?
Right !
I'm gonna make you a big one.Ya moron! Ain't you ashamed ?
Anyway, I've got no future anymore. And this is all Tetsu's fault.
Whaaat? Say, it ain't my business! I ain't done nothing!
[Obaa throws a shoe at him]
Yeow!
WHY DONCHA JUST SHUT UP!
Guess what, Mommy! Poppa's got a job.
I know, your Grandma told me. She said that you found him this job. I'd like to thank you a lot, Chie.
Say, how great! C'mon, man, gimme that okonomiyaki!
Sorry,chap. I just made it for this little girl.
What the...!!!
[bangs on the table]
YOU'RE GONNA GIMME THIS OKONOMIYAKI, GOT IT?!! AND I MEAN *RIGHT NOW*!!!

[whispers relieved]
How *great*!!
